name: Monstrous Christmas Cards
description:
Bah humbug! If conventional Christmas cards are boring you and you want to send festive best wishes to your loved ones that carry a suitable touch of the macabre, here's a solution...

Spread the good cheer with these original designs by James Clayton and bid your friends "Merry Squidmas!" or urge them to enjoy their festive fang time. It comes with a blood red envelope - jingle bells not included.

Just make sure that you have a monstrous Christmas, children...

name: Unlocking Love Print/Postcard
description:
Open up your heart and share the love! You can do that with this sappy/sweet piece and send it to your treasured ones for this is both a print and a postcard.

An original design by James Clayton, this could be your key to an epic romance or just a cutesy little thing to stick on your wall. Regardless, feel the love...

name: Subspace Radio Marriage Zine
description:
We're living in a manic modern digitalised space age of technology, artificial intelligence and cyberspaces that inspire both exhilaration and intense nausea. James Clayton has tried to consolidate his futuristic affection and his techsistential dread and poured it all into Subspace Radio Marriage - a 100% homemade zine.

There are sketches, elaborate techy diagrams, silly poems, pretentious pseudo-philosophical musings and a mecha-chimp. Get a hold of a copy and enjoy... (or find yourself wanting to run away from your computer and return to the Stone Age where you have no chance of being seduced by an android)

name: Pre-Teen Mutant Ninja Turtle Prints
description:
Cowabunga! Here's a touch of Turtle Power on postcards/prints that either pays tribute to pop culture icons or destroys the legend by turning them into Turtles, Jr.

Regardless, you can collect the whole colourful clan - as doodled up by James Clayton - and send 'em to you nearest and dearest sewer-dweller friends. Enjoy the miniature heroes in a half-shell...

name: Grow Your Own Gamepad Prints
description: Game on! Nature meets nostalgia and retro videogames return ripe and ready to rock out on colour postcards/prints. Original designs lovingly created by James Clayton. His favourite game is The Legend of Mystical Ninja. Show your love and let it grow, then stick on a stamp and send it to your friends... Each individual card is £2.50 or you can collect 'em all for £10 bonus price.
